name: @feup-infolab/docker-mocha
description: Running mocha tests in isolated, parallel and cached environments
author: nuno.neto

scripts.test: npm run copy-files; npm run delete-and-rebuild; npm run run-test; npm run delete-files
scripts.delete-and-rebuild: docker rmi -f nuno/node-currency:latest; cd test; docker build --no-cache -t nuno/node-currency:latest .; cd ..
scripts.copy-files: cp -R src/* test/src; cp docker-mocha-run.js test/docker-mocha-run.js
scripts.delete-files: cd test; rm docker-mocha-run.js; cd src; rm DockerManager.js; rm DockerMocha.js; rm graph.py; rm utils.js; cd ../..
